1.content: Naruto wakes up after a good nights sleep “man that felt good to get some rest” says naruto. Naruto finds a letter with a package next to him. “Huh”? “What’s this”? Says naruto. He opens the package and there is a postion inside. Naruto then opens the letter. It reads “hello naruto we have given you this postion so you can understand what it is like to be one of the great tailed beasts hope you have fun with it signed ?”. Naruto the shrugs off and drinks the postion. He then feels a tingle in his body. He then becomes? What tailed beast does he become?
1.title: Life as a summoning beast

15.content: What other tailed beasts could he become?
15.title: Other

152.content: Naruto the sees that he has become the six tailed beast saiken. https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/naru... “Man this is cool” says naruto. A cloud of smoke then appears around naruto/saiken naruto is summoned by Ōtsutsuki Hagoromo. “Great six tails I wish for you to eat the other tailed beasts” says Ōtsutsuki Hagoromo. Naruto look at him in disbleaf. But you fallow his command and hunt down the other tailed beasts. Which does naruto eat first
152.title: Saiken the Six-Tailed Slug

155.content: What other tailed beasts could he become or does he become a regular summoning beast?
155.title: Other

info.description: Naruto gets turned into one of the nine tailed beasts and he can be summoned by any of the summoners that own the beast he has become
